import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Start ticket work"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/start"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Marks a ticket as in progress and assigns the acting technician so timers, workflow rules, and activity streams update.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Locate the ticket via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **Issue confirmation** – Call [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/confirm-issue](/docs/api/tickets/confirm-ticket-issue) to acknowledge the selected issue before starting work.
3. **UserId** – Determine the technician beginning work (typically the current agent) via [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) or from the ticket metadata.

**Workflow Example**
1. Confirm the ticket issue with [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/confirm-issue](/docs/api/tickets/confirm-ticket-issue).
2. Start the ticket by POSTing to /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/start with the acting technician's `UserId`.
3. Refresh ticket data via [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket), [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-timeline), and [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-next-steps) to update the UI.

**Minimal Required Fields**: ticketId (path), UserId (body).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the ticket to start. >
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Payload used to mark a ticket as started by a technician.","properties":{"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the technician beginning work on the ticket. Use [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) to locate the user or reuse the acting agent's identifier from [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket).","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchUsers","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/search","responseField":"Item.Users[].UserId"},"example":"1eb32e06-b79f-f011-b484-002248538047"}},"required":["UserId"],"title":"TicketStartRequest"},"example":{"UserId":"1eb32e06-b79f-f011-b484-002248538047"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
